/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a vibrant light. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
